titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 75th anniversary of the Alaska State Troopers.
A resolution commemorating the 75th anniversary of the Alaska State Troopers.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Alaska State Troopers on its 75th anniversary.
Expresses appreciation to the commissioned officers and civilian personnel of the Alaska State Troopers, to the Village Public Safety Officers, and to their families for their service and sacrifice.
